person.persName: Elijah Hall Burnside (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Ann Doty in Garrard County on October 4, 1854. Remarried to Mary Catherine Conner in Lincoln, Kentucky, on September 14, 1858. Father of Bettie Burnside, Allie M. Burnside, and Pattie Burnside. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1860. Served as the Garrard County delegate to the Council of Ten, a convention of ten counties not under the control of the Federal armies, assembled at Russellville, Kentucky, on December 18, 1861.
